name: Bubble POP!
description:
Bubble Gum Game Submitted to Quarantine Jam 2020
Player 1:
    Blow up the bubble with 'W'
Player 2:
    Blow up the bubble with 'Up Arrow Key'
Each pack of gum has different stats:
    Inflate Speed: How quickly bubble will inflate
    Deflate Speed: How quickly bubble will deflate
    Inflate Durability: How long bubble can inflate before popping
    Deflate Durability: How long bubble can deflate before popping
Bubble regains Inflate Durability gradually as it deflates
Don't let it deflate to much or it'll pop too.
Balance between Inflate and Deflate to get the largest BUBBLE!

Assets from Kenny (www.kenny.ln)
